name: Graveyard Ghoul!
description:
Graveyard Ghoul is an 8-bit tile-based puzzle game about navigating a very disorganized graveyard!

You're on a very personal mission this Halloween, yet at every step the graveyard does its best to make show you that you are unwelcome.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move
Ctrl + Z: Undo
Ctrl + R: Restart level
